column1: Explain the concept of Big Data and its characteristics (Volume, Velocity, Variety).
Discuss different distributed computing frameworks for handling Big Data (e.g., Apache Spark, Hadoop).
Briefly explain the benefits of using cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure, GCP) for data science workloads.
Describe your experience with using cloud-based storage solutions for data management (e.g., S3 buckets).
Discuss the importance of data security and privacy practices in data science projects.
